markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Transcribe Moment](/Feats.aspx?ID=2235) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 44</row>

**Archetype** [Scrollmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=31)

**Prerequisites**
[Scrollmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1130)

</column>

---

You gain the [_transcribe moment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=831) focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) by spending 10 minutes to study a text or record notes on your recent experiences.
name: Transcribe Moment
